**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 44 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 [Taon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1715) **Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 31 **Perception** +25; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +26, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +29, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +29, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +28 **Str** +6 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** +1 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +6 **Items** [_Spellcutter_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1457) --- **AC** 38 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +26 **Will** +23 **HP** 230 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), **[paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)** Resistances piercing 15, slashing 10
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Mohrg Spawn** ([occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A living creature slain by a mohrg that had a lower level than the mohrg rises as a [mohrg spawn](/Monsters.aspx?ID=729) after 1d4 rounds, on its turn. This mohrg spawn is under the command of the mohrg that created it. If the creator of the mohrg spawn is destroyed, the mohrg spawn is destroyed as well, immediately collapsing into a pile of decayed flesh and bones. --- **Speed** 50 feet, climb 25 feet **Melee** claw +29, **Damage** 3d12+14 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** tongue +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** paralysis **Melee** _Spellcutter_ +31 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d8+14 slashing (cannot damage living creatures) **Cruel Reactions** Taon gains an extra reaction each round that can be used only to make an Attack of Opportunity. **Paralysis** ([Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A living creature hit by Taon's tongue Strike must succeed at a DC 36 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). The creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each attempt.
